name: Crowned Heads - Mil Dias - Marranitos Edicion Limitada 2022
additionalNotes: Named for the 1,000 days it took to create, Mil Días takes an Ecuadorian Habano wrapper and puts it over a Nicaraguan binder and fillers originating from Costa Rica, Nicaragua, and Peru to create a flavor profile well worth the wait. This four vitola line is a medium-full bodied experience that will have creamy notes of coca, graham cracker, natural sweetness, and a peppery finish dancing across your palate from start to finish. Created with the same precise construction as all their other lines, this cigar will leave no doubt in your mind that it was well worth the wait.
